messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Yahoo Answers
messages.msgSnippet: Someone posted It s OK except for the creepy christian aspect BeeZaar! ... HRmmm....perhaps the only book theyve seen at barnes and noble was unschooling
messages.messageBody:
Someone posted "It's OK except for the creepy christian aspect"
BeeZaar!
>>>>>>>>>>>>>

HRmmm....perhaps the only book theyve seen at barnes and noble was unschooling children in the freedon of christ ( or something like that) ?

Or wait...surely we are one of those cults who gasp! treat our children with respect love and kindness

growl :) I probably shouldnt be posting today..Im in a cynical pissy and downright rotten mood

Nicole

BeeZaar!
Elissa Jill

messages.subject: Yahoo Answers
messages.msgSnippet: Just thought id share my mix of humor and frustrations in more bored random web  searching today.  Yahoo has a forum called yahoo answers  which I got to by
messages.messageBody:
Just thought id share my mix of humor and frustrations in more bored random
web searching today. Yahoo has a forum called yahoo answers which I got to
by googling how much is a broken front axle. After discovering that i truly
dont know anything about cars I decided to type in what is unschooling......
WOW lets just say if i were still new id would have never trusted myself to try
to let go after browsing there! So if your bored theres a whole lot of
posting that can be done! Id say just google yahoo answers to get started!

Chrissy
